participant_abstract.sent: The participants of the meeting discussed their idea of the product we are about to design.
We first talked about a remote control that would be a combination of many remote controls: TV, DVD player, VCR, etc.
We then thought that it might be better to concentrate on just a TV remote control as it would be simpler and would enable us to stay within budget and concentrate on cool things like design etc.

participant_actions.sent: Each member is getting prepared for the next meeting about Phase 1.

participant_decisions.sent: Talking about a simple TV control.
Deciding to go for a simple but very nice and trendy TV remote.
